idea: It is business which revolves around spectacles and sunglass provision to defence force personnel and their families since they are located at far flung places and have no access to retail stores and thus are left devoid of important requirement like clear and clean vision.

idea:
Fit Food Company was established in February 2016 in an effort to create a meal management company that
athletes and fitness/health enthusiasts can fully rely on 100%.
Fit Food Company stays true to its name by only using the finest and freshest ingredients to produce delectable
Macro Controlled dishes.
The hallmark to our unique style is retaining the nutritional value of nature’s ingredients and serving it with a better
taste, “WE MAKE FITNESS TASTE BETTER”.
name: Fit Food Company

idea: We Design, Develop Web and Mobile Application, also Provide Digital Marketing Service, SEO, SMM, SEM, SMO & many more.
name: SPEXIUM INFOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: In Hospitals, Pharmaceuticals, Laboratories, Greenhouses, Poultry farms, etc Aerial disinfection has become mandatory. There are various chemical as well as ecofriendly disinfection solutions available today. These solutions have to be sprayed in the air in the fine mist form. We designed and marketed a Ultra Low Volume Fogger Machine to facilitate such aerial disinfection. In last one year, we have already sold 300+ machines. We also have a rotatory table designed to give the fogging capability over 360 degrees.
name: SANITECH INNOVATIONS LLP
